# gdelt-py

> Python client library for GDELT (Global Database of Events, Language, and Tone)

gdelt-py is a Python client library for GDELT (Global Database of Events, Language, and Tone).
It provides unified access to all 6 REST APIs, 3 database tables (Events, Mentions, GKG),
and NGrams dataset with modern async-first design, Pydantic models, and streaming support.


## Getting Started

- [Installation](https://rbozydar.github.io/py-gdelt/getting-started/installation/index.md)
- [Quick Start](https://rbozydar.github.io/py-gdelt/getting-started/quickstart/index.md)
- [Configuration](https://rbozydar.github.io/py-gdelt/getting-started/configuration/index.md)

- [Lookups](https://rbozydar.github.io/py-gdelt/user-guide/lookups/index.md)
- [Streaming](https://rbozydar.github.io/py-gdelt/user-guide/streaming/index.md)
- [Deduplication](https://rbozydar.github.io/py-gdelt/user-guide/deduplication/index.md)
- [Error Handling](https://rbozydar.github.io/py-gdelt/user-guide/errors/index.md)
